Hunnabatum, naditu Ninurta, bought a house at Geme-Nanna, naditu.  10 witnesses, some broken and not considered.Two years later, following a claim bearing on a Mithonian wall, the posts and roses, Hunnabatum paid to Nanna-adah (brother of the seller), a compensation of 3 1/2 shekels.
